by ZaLoS

skybox by KARATEKAEFER
custom textures by ZaLoS, IceCreamLock
Prefabs by Uberkirsche

**v2 changes**
took out mortars, if spammed they could crash a server. Replaced them with more traditional jail kills. Blue side sets everyone's health in jail to 1 hp. Red side ignites everyone in jail for a slow burn :D
******************

**v1changes**
changed the way scoring is done to alleviate crashes
fixed a bug that made it so cts could not score after capping a flag
******************


CTF!!! (capture the flag, nub)

Above each teams spawn is their flag and a Drop zone. Each team can attempt to capture the opposing teams flag and bring it to their drop zone where they drop the flag to earn a point. 

You can only earn a point if your flag is at your base. 

Amount of points needed to win every round changes, the number of points need can be seen inbetween the scoreboard. 

A team that wins by capturing the flags receives points for each member on the opposite team that is alive. 

1 point games = 10 points
2 point games = 20 points
3 point games = 40 points


thanks:
Special thanks to intox. Jason for hosting the beta! Additional thanks to the intox crew for coming out for the testing. Testers include intox. Tom, intox. Zman, Black Sheep, [Blarg] !nfamous, [Blarg] .waffleburger. FireTaco, WaRxHeAd. Thanks to everyone else that tested as well!


Note: This map is not intended for DM server, However, I will be releasing a DM version! No block is recommended for this map. This map has no affiliation with any clans or servers that may have the word velocity in their name. 


Warning: spamming e-leftclick in rapid succession on the mortar has been found to cause game crashes. Im working on a fix right now but if one cannot be found I will be removing the mortar entirely. (Removed in v2)

surf_crush2 is a Tier 6 Linear map with 1 Bonus.

surf_crush2 is the sequel to surf_crush, a map I released in 2015 back when I was trying out faster-paced surf. It's got more room for error than its predecessor, but maintains a high-speed and movement-based gameplay while being 3x the length. The map was mostly done years ago but was finished only recently.

The bonus is short and fairly easy, inspired by Spy_Complex's mapping style (but much more tame in the end result).

Thanks to many of my friends over the years for giving me the motivation to continue the project, especially Spy_Complex, Sam, and not_a_zombie. Thanks to hesuka for providing demos for the showcase video. And thanks to anyone who plays my map!! Enjoy! :]

Surf_crossfire;
Created by MikeKnoop;
Concept by MikeKnoop;

Version Control:
The most recent versions can be found in one of two places. Both are updated simotaneosly.
	1. http://www.fpsbanana.com, search for surf_crossfire
	2. http://www.mikeknoop.com/upload/surf_crossfire.zip, the link will always contain the newest version.


History:
	Version_FINAL:
		-Final Release on May 30, 2006
		-ADD: The gun you may pickup now randomlly cycles through AK47, M4A1, and Shotgun
			(that was back-breaking labour!)
		-FIX: The edge of the bottom surfs push you into the water to prevent camping.

	Version_v2c:
		-Release on April 29, 2006
		-CHANGE: Last release had 28 spawn points, now there are 40
		-CHANGE: There used to be 6 random teleport location in the jail, upped to 12
			 with hopes of reducing people getting stuck in each other
		-FIX: Water depth increased, with hopes of fixing people dying when hitting the	
			jail floor (this fix is for 66 and 100 tick servers)
			
	Version_v2b:
		-Released on April 28, 2006
		-Version_v2 was used for internal teesting
		-ADD: AWP weapon to the bombsite platform
		-ADD: Bomb explode effects
		-FIX: Fixed the glitch causing people to die when entering jail "hard"
		-FIX: Fixed players getting stuck on main ramp, now they can climb the lower lip
		-CHANGE: Added a trigger_hurt entity to the lips of the jail water. Meaning, the game
			 will now hurt you if you try to camp on one of the water lips
		-CHANGE: Shotguns now don't start with full ammo. Just one clip of 8. Extra ammo can be
			 obtained by going through teleports on top of spawn boxes

	Version_v1:
		-Released to public on April 25, 2006


Contact:
	Email: mikeknoop@gmail.com
	AIM: ohsnapitsm1ke

~ All map ideas, suggestions, requests, anger, flamings, etc. etc. are appreciated! ~

The First beta for crazyleap.

The goal of this map is to snipe, knife, nade or blow the shit out of the opposing team. There are two cannons which are located on top of each team's inverted ramp. You use the surf ramps to your advantage in this surf/awp style map to quickly access various parts of the map to kill the bitches.

Surf_cp_desolation_DM

by ZaLoS

and SolidSurf

custom textures by ZaLoS, IceCreamLock


This is the death match version of the map, for the regular version go to:
http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/55779



Capture Point!!! In the center of the map you will see a platform with a light above it. This platform is thecapture point. Each team starts with 150 points that tic down every second. First team to 0 loses. By taking the capture point you can stop your teams ticker from ticking. In order to take the capture point, it must be clear of people from the other team, it takes 10 seconds to capture the point. Afterwards you can leave the point and it will remain yours untill a member of the opposing team stands on it for 10secs.

Losers Die, winners Live :D

Special Thanks:
The Kosher Pork for setting up Beta testing, and intox. Gaming for testing! testers include intox. Firefox,intox. Scareface, intox. Seaking,  intox. Tom, intox. Clutch, IceCreamLock, Zman and many more! Addtional thanks to www.solidsurf.info, fpsbanana.com, and other individuals such as PaperCut and Bucknasty formapping advice ;)


Additional thanks to Silent-Extreme for helping out with the DM version, surf this map and many others at Silent-Extreme's DM | RPG server @ 195.122.135.12:27015

** note : All the files downloaded from the 18th of August are the good surf_core's , normally all the buggs are fixed now , i hope anyway. !**

Surf_core

Well as you all know. Me and swat have been working on this map for well over a year, mostly due to the fact we had to start again because of some major bugs.

BUT at long last. we proudly present to you 
surf_core. :drinkin:

6 levels ; 2 bonuses 
The jail has 4 big traps which we’ll leave to you to find out for yourself

There are 3 secrets within some levels each with different rewards. They are hard to get to but well worth it.

Level 1

** screenshot 1**

This is the spawn with a couple of nice dragons in there that seem to light up the spawn area.

** screenshot 2**

This is level one and the start of level two. The skybox shows how the earth has been destroyed by the effects of the earth core becoming hotter.

Level 2

** screenshot 3**

Underground level 2 you can see that there is little light apart from the giant torches used to light up the level.

Level 3

** screenshot 4**

Level 3 is slightly more difficult than level 1 and 2 but is still possible for all you not so good surfers. Level 3 marks the half way point to the core.

Level 4

** screenshot 5**

Level 4 is significantly harder than the previous levels. This is really when the map begins to get difficult.

Level 5&

** screenshot 6**

Level 5 really does feel as if you are getting a lot deeper into the earth as you can see the first signs of magma on the floor of the level. Once again, this level is extremely difficult.

Level 6

http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/1470/7k0f9atmp.jpg (look bottom)

This is the spawn of level 6. AS you can see this does not look very difficult. But I can assure you this is the hardest level of them all.

http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/4489/935f9btmp.jpg (look bottom)

The end of level 6. You can see the core being blasted to pieces by the giant cannon. Swat did a lovely job of adding some explosion effects to the core to make it seem as if it could collapse any second.

When you land on the platform next to the core, you must press the button to lower the control panel on the gun. Then you must press the button for a grenade to throw at the control panel. Once the panel Is destroyed a platform will rise from the lava and voila the map is complete.

Bonus 1

http://img8.imageshack.us/img8/4135/fl2f9ctmp.jpg[/img](look bottom)

Bonus 1 made by Xile.
The two bonuses on surf core are very difficult, but rewarding. I will not reveal anything about the bonuses.

Bonus 2;

http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/364/sn3f9dtmp.jpg (look bottom)

Bonus 2 made by Thes.
This bonus is harder than bonus 1 and is also more rewarding than bonus 1. Once again I will not reveal anything.

The Jail;

http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/3295/c3sf97tmp.jpg (look bottom)

A large 7 story building surrounded by a pool of magma. The higher the level you got to – the higher you will be in jail and you will get a better gun. It is possible to shoot people on the level below you, but not people on the level above. You can also teleport to the level below you using the teleporters (made by untelo) in the center of the jail.
When you complete the map – you will be taken to an elevator beside the jail and can choose to either shoot the enemies – or choose from a variety of fun filled traps. Which I will leave for you to find out.

This fact file was made by illusion. Thank you for reading.

From Swat and I and we hope you enjoy the map. HAVE FUN!


**Note** : I only can upload 6 screenshort for the moment on fpsbanana. I'm trying to get the other ones on it also.

For more screenshots look at 

http://forums.solidsurf.info/index.php/topic,2331.0.html
or
http://surf-velocity.bplaced.net/index.php?page=Thread&threadID=251
or
http://tfm-clan.actie-forum.com/counter-strike-source-f1/surf_core-t49.htm

This is the last time im updating surf_combine. Have fun :) THIS MAP IS NOT MEANT TO BE PLAYED WITH LOW GRAVITY OR ANYTHING HIGHER THAN SV_AIRACCELERATE 10 Changes since surf_combine_extended2: -Added my name near spawn -Changed glass in spawn to combine glass -Added 4 level -Added Win room and fight arena -Fixed exploit where you could skip parts of the first level. -Fixed teleport triggers at bottom of map -Changed and fixed water and water textures (reports of death after teleporting form bottom of map) -Added env_cubemap to more appropirate surfaces. -Added Terrorist surf spiral (instead of CT and T sharing the same spiral in the first level) -And some more minor changes

-Names are not credits, merely the people in my clan at the time.
-Yes I know the waterfall is transparent, not a bug, a helpful but cool glitch
-Lucifer helped with ideas for new places, new things etc.
-Find a way to ominous black box in the sky
-ORIGINAL AUTHOR ace of spades13

I have had some complaints about the huge file size of surf_combine_extended3... So i basically just decided to deleted un needed pbjects left over from other versions and use the nodraw texture drastically. I didnt on the first few versions becuase i never knew that i'd make this map so big...

<b>The file size went from a huge 22mb to an okay 15mb. So it should be easier and faster  to host and download from peoples servers'.

New Version

The Jail is now improved to the max.

O button - Opens Jail

Trap button - presses prisoners against glass

^ button - separates them against glass

Kill button- Crushes against ceiling

In th jail to escape instead of water now there is a tube you jump and it shoots you to top. At the bottom it's covered with a door.

Have Fun.

Any questions comments suggestions email at jakemeikle300@hotmail.com

Email me with questions/comments at jakemeikle300@hotmail.com

+ Fixed glitches

+ Pistol area

A surf map that kinda looks like an arena. 

-- Details
Both teams start at their base, with a m3, deagle and knife equiped. Their objective is to eliminate the other team.

Weapons in the map: 
- M4A1
- AWP
- M3
- Deagle
- Knife

Players are immune to fall damage, please let me know if I have to remove that, since I'm not sure if it makes gameplay too easy.

The map doesn't contain a jail, maybe something to work on in the sequel (if comments are positive ;))
Players can telehop by surfing in the 'top' teleport. 


Please let me know what you think of it :D
